column2: A higher minimum wage may lead to difficulties for small businesses and potential job losses.
column3: Raising the minimum wage is an attempt to address income inequality.
column4: Increasing the minimum wage could accelerate the adoption of automation and robotics in low-skilled jobs.
column5: Implementation of a higher minimum wage may result in inflation and negatively impact higher income individuals.
column6: Some individuals believe the minimum wage should be raised even higher than the proposed amount, such as $20 or $25 per hour.
